name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands, with four main ones making up most of its landmass.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world, stretching over 202,080 km.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world’s oxygen.

name: India
interestingFact: India has the world's largest democracy and the second-largest population.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for its autobahns, where some sections have no speed limits.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world’s largest coral reef system.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to the Pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world, attracting over 80 million.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving different branches of government.
